items.sentence: I wish you had not told him about the plan.
I wonder how long Tom will be in Australia.
Tom demanded to know why Mary didn\'t come.
I want to become better at speaking French.
I want to buy a really good smoke detector.
I want to find out what caused the problem.
Tom has been refusing to take his medicine.
Tom has been taken into protective custody.
Tom has called in sick the last three days.
Tom has changed his email address recently.
Mary said she thought Tom ought to do that.
Mary said she thought Tom was going to win.
Mary said she thought Tom would be careful.
Mary said she thought Tom would be grouchy.
Mary said she thought Tom would be jealous.
Tom nursed the wounded bird back to health.
Tom offered to pay Mary to clean his house.
Tom only spent three dollars for his lunch.
Tom only wears a suit on special occasions.
My sister will get married early next year.
She keeps complaining that she has no time.
Tom is convinced that he needed to do that.
Tom is much faster at doing that than Mary.
Tom lives in a house without running water.
You\'d better be careful not to catch cold.
I\'m not sure why Tom didn\'t pay the bill.
I still can\'t believe that Tom hates Mary.
I still don\'t like watching horror movies.
I still don\'t understand French very well.
I still haven\'t bought everything we need.

I wonder why Tom likes this school so much.

If you don\'t want to do this, just say so.

Tom opened the door to the conference room.
Be careful not to do anything to upset Tom.
Can I ask what you think may have happened?
